## Criterion.Level.Of type

All criteria of the specified level under the specific version.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type Of<L extends Level, V extends Version = Version.Recommendation> = {
            [C in Chapter]: L extends Level<C, V> ? C : never;
        }[Chapter];
```
